pages.text: What you're most likely using the mod for. Item Modifiers will give tools and armour special abilities when applied in a Smithing Table. You can't combine multiple modifiers on a single item, you just have to pick one.
Makes the tool or armour unbreakable. Can also be right clicked to repair all items in your inventory. Requires a Tier 3 Forge and a $(l:resources/stellarite)Stellarite Piece$()
Increases Item Pickup radius. Can also be used to upgrade Darkstone Pedestals.
Automatically smelts mined blocks. This works on top of Fortune. Requires an $(l:forging/enhancer_relics#elementarium)Elementarium$() enhancer relic.
Makes a tool mine a 3x3 area. Requires an $(l:forging/enhancer_relics#elementarium)Elementarium$() enhancer relic.
Gives slight regeneration when underwater. Requires an $(l:forging/enhancer_relics#elementarium)Elementarium$() enhancer relic.
Doesn't currently have a use. Requires an $(l:forging/enhancer_relics#elementarium)Elementarium$() enhancer relic.
